> [[=]]
> //The SCP Foundation is a secret organization tasked with securing and containing anomalous objects, maintaining the status-quo, and protecting humanity from which it cannot protect itself.//
> 
> They have failed.
> 
> //What little remains of the Foundation is scattered to small cells, holed-up in their facilities, unable to deal with any of the gods, deities, eldritch abominations of the old and new, as they are simply counting their remaining days now.//
> 
> The Foundation has lost.
> 
> //A few individuals, however, have decided to crawl out of their holes of apathy, and decided that they cannot let humanity end.//
> 
> Not like this.
> 
> //Welcome to the **ends of the world**.//
> 
> //They are all that’s left...//
> [[/=]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab 1. What is this?]]
This is a story of the end of the world, son!

A //Splinter// canon, if you will, of the main Competitive Eschatology storyline, this focuses on a more grim world, in which the SCP Foundation, despite everything, has failed to protect humanity.

Only a few and far-between individuals disembark on a journey to save the world. Whether they succeed is up to them.
[[/tab]]
[[tab 2. What should the tone be?]]
Mostly bleak, and weird, and batshit crazy, and funny!

Competitive Eschatology is an odd canon to begin with; ever wondered what it would look like if [[[SCP-098|098]]] were to finally //activate?//

Because everyone & everything these characters once knew and loved has been completely and utterly obliterated into its individual molecules, the state of our characters is at a low point. So try to keep it mostly serious.

But don’t make it too depressing; as is often said, laughter is the best medicine! And in such a bleak world, people tend to try to cope with their new situation. //Us humans with our hope, and all that.//

Again: This isn’t a set-in-stone requirement, so feel free to do //whatever you want//!
[[/tab]]
[[tab 3. I’ve got a story]]
Great! If you’ve got a finished tale or maybe even SCP, post a link to the sandbox in the discussion thread, DM or contact me on Discord! //(Username: Springcrap.)// However you’d prefer!

I’ll then read through it and add it to the canon, maybe either as part of the main storyline or as //another// Splinter/standalone work //(A Splinter within a Splinter? Blasphemous!)//.

Sounds more tedious than it actually is; just want to read what other people have put together for this Splinter!
[[/tab]]
[[tab 4. Artwork]]
If you have artwork, please contact me via one //(or all!)// of the aforementioned ways, and I’ll move said artwork to a seperate page on this page!
[[/tab]]
